messageBody:
Thanks for providing another approach.

--- Kent Beck <kentb@...> wrote:

> If you want to report test failures, you could
> subclass TestResult and
> override addFailure() and addError, or you could
> attach a TestListener to an
> existing TestResult. This will require you to write
> your own test runner of
> some sort, but a simple runner is not complex. It
> can be as simple as:
>
> Test suite= createMyTestSuite();
> TestResult result= new TestResult();
> result.addListener(new MyTestListener());
> suite.run(result);
>
> Sincerely yours,
>
> Kent Beck
> Three Rivers Institute
